title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 452 of 2020)), after consulting with the Garda
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Garda Síochána (Retirement)
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Garda Síochána (Retirement) 

Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 2 September 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited garda siochana (retirement) regulation 2023 (2) regulation shall come operation 2 september 2023

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 452 of 2020)), after consulting with the Garda
heading: 2. Notwithstanding anything contained in -
text_raw:
2. Notwithstanding anything contained in - 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

the Gárda Síochána (Retirement) Regulations 1934 (S. R. & O. 
No. 146 of 1934), as continued in force by section 128 of the 
Garda Síochána Act 2005, 

the Gárda Síochána (Retirement) (No. 2) Regulations 1951 (S.I. 
No. 335 of 1951), as so continued in force, or 

the Garda Síochána Act 2005 (Retirement) Regulations 2018 (S.I. 
No. 28 of 2018), 

the member of the Garda Síochána who, immediately before the coming into 
operation of these regulations, holds the rank of Garda Commissioner shall retire 
on 1 June 2025. 

The Government hereby approve of the foregoing Regulations. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

25 July, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Justice, 

25 July, 2023. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th August, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [397] 3
